name: Ancient Shadow Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: The Ancient Shadow Dragon embodies darkness, with glowing eyes and a swirling mass of shadows, capable of flying gracefully and moving incorporeally through solid objects.
memorable: Its grip on shadows grants it the ability to inflict psychic damage alongside necrotic harm, making it a dual threat both physically and psychologically.
goals: Typically seeks power and dominion over its area of influence, tied spiritually to a specific location.
relations: May be related to other dragons and undead creatures, serving as a potent master to lesser beings.
environment: Often found in dark, mystical locales with strong ties to shadow or necrotic energy.
strengths: Possesses high resilience with various immunities and resistances, exceptional spellcasting abilities, and powerful breath attacks.
weaknesses: Reliance on a specific area for its Essence Link; if removed from this area, it cannot benefit from long rests.
attacks: Utilizes multiple attacks with its bite and claws, and can grapple foes with shadows while dealing necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Anguished Breath, a devastating breath attack that inflicts necrotic damage and imposes psychological strife.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 240 feet with a passive perception of 20.
skills: Excels in deception, capable of manipulating opponents, and has high stealth proficiency.
additional_information: Can become incorporeal while moving through objects and creatures.
Has the ability to teleport through shadows, enhancing its mobility.
Inflicts levels of strife on those entering its lost essence area.
Can restore hit points by using its Horrid Whispers ability combat.
Possesses a legendary resistance that allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma, capable of casting powerful spells like darkness and hallow.
